content.text: Match ends, Atlético de Madrid 3, Valencia 0.
Second Half ends, Atlético de Madrid 3, Valencia 0.
Attempt saved. Filipe Luis (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Diego Costa.
Attempt missed. Dorlan Pabón (Valencia) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Paco Alcácer.
Corner,  Atlético de Madrid. Conceded by Jeremy Mathieu.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Juanfran (Atlético de Madrid) because of an injury.
Foul by Juanfran (Atlético de Madrid).
Pablo Piatti (Valencia) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Substitution, Atlético de Madrid. Adrián López replaces Arda Turan.
Foul by Oriol Romeu (Valencia).
Koke (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Goal!  Atlético de Madrid 3, Valencia 0. Diego Costa (Atlético de Madrid) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
Penalty Atlético de Madrid. Diego Costa draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Antonio Barragán (Valencia) after a foul in the penalty area.
Corner,  Atlético de Madrid. Conceded by Jeremy Mathieu.
Attempt blocked. Arda Turan (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

Corner,  Atlético de Madrid. Conceded by Víctor Ruiz.
Substitution, Valencia. Pablo Piatti replaces Andrés Guardado.
Diego Costa (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Víctor Ruiz (Valencia).
Penalty saved! Diego Costa (Atlético de Madrid) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom left corner.
Víctor Ruiz (Valencia) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Penalty conceded by Víctor Ruiz (Valencia) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Atlético de Madrid. Diego Costa draws a foul in the penalty area.
Offside, Atlético de Madrid. Raul García tries a through ball, but Diego Costa is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Juan Bernat (Valencia) left footed shot from the left side of the box is too high. Assisted by Oriol Romeu.
Corner,  Atlético de Madrid. Conceded by Dorlan Pabón.
Attempt blocked. Arda Turan (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Filipe Luis.
Foul by Raul García (Atlético de Madrid).
Sergio Canales (Valencia) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Valencia. Dorlan Pabón replaces Sofiane Feghouli.
Goal!  Atlético de Madrid 2, Valencia 0. Raul García (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Substitution, Atlético de Madrid. Raul García replaces David Villa.
Delay in match Sofiane Feghouli (Valencia) because of an injury.
Substitution, Valencia. Paco Alcácer replaces Jonas.
Goal!  Atlético de Madrid 1, Valencia 0. Diego Costa (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Diego Godín following a fast break.
Attempt missed. Tiago (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box misses to the left. Assisted by Miranda with a cross.
Corner,  Atlético de Madrid. Conceded by Jeremy Mathieu.
Attempt blocked. David Villa (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Gabi.

Attempt missed. Sergio Canales (Valencia) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Juan Bernat following a fast break.
Foul by Gabi (Atlético de Madrid).
Jonas (Valencia) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt saved. Diego Costa (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Koke.
